about_the_game:
Secure the site against hostile Entities or take control of an Alpha Entity and fight against your human oppressors!
Entity pits humanity against supernatural "Entities" in an asymmetric multiplayer first person shooter.

Unit 5
- Take command as a British special forces team and move into the site, re-capturing or neutralising all hostile entities as you do.
- Ensure that the most powerful Entity, one for each site, does not escape by completing objectives around the Site.
- Explore the site to find powerful artefacts and research notes that help you and your team in combatting the Entities.

Entities
- Alpha Entities are the player controlled Entities, each being unique in the abilities and properties that they have.
- Beta Entities are Non-player controlled, help them out as they also lash out against Unit 5!
- Grow as an Entity by completing your own personal objectives, allowing you to upgrade your abilities to give yourselves further ways to fight humanity.

The Site
- Each site will be unique in appearance and layout, with different layouts per match
- Beta Entities (NPCs) will be different per match, and will have different spawns and roaming patterns.

name: Entity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.3 Ghz to 3.69 Ghz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
